scenario_text.value: (Hmm... As I thought, I can’t get past here.)
(Wait...is it just me, or have the webs...?)

Yeah, there’s a lot more of the sticky stuff
than before.

Does that mean the enemy’s setting traps
throughout the school as we speak?!

We should hurry, Takuma. Things are just
gonna get worse at this rate.
By worse, you mean we’ll get captured, too?

Not a chance! Let’s find the path into the
gym, pronto!

We have to find the path into the gym before
our situation gets any worse!
